article_title: Dignity Health faces lawsuit over Redding hospital’s refusal to perform contraceptive surgeries
article_text:
ACLU threatens lawsuit if Dignity Health doesn’t reverse its denial of tubal ligations

Catholic hospitals adhere to church doctrines that call contraception ‘intrinsically evil’

Tubal ligations used by about 30 percent of married U.S. women

article_metadata.title: Dignity Health faces lawsuit over Redding hospital’s refusal to perform contraceptive surgeries | Fresno Bee

og.description: With a toddler and a new baby on the way, Rachel Miller and her husband felt their family was complete. Miller, with her doctor’s recommendation, asked to have her tubes tied as a permanent form of birth control, a procedure used by millions of women in recent decades.
